corpname.value: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives

unittitle.value:
Randall Smith: Veterans of the Abraham Lincoln Brigade Historical Commission
        Records

p.value:
Materials are open to researchers. Please contact the Tamiment Library & Robert F.
        Wagner Labor Archives for more information and to schedule an appointment,
        tamiment.wagner@nyu.edu or 212-998-2630.

This collection consists of material from the 1970s-1980s accumulated by Lincoln Brigade
        veteran Randall B. (Pete) Smith in his role as chair of the Veterans of the Abraham Lincoln
        Brigade (VALB) Historical Commission. It contains of files on various collective and
        individual veterans' projects (historical and commemorative), including the researching,
        funding and publication of <emph render="italic">Prisoners of the Good Fight</emph> (1986)
        by Carl Geiser. There are also typescripts of some twenty published and unpublished memoirs
        of varying length. Includes correspondence with veterans, researchers, and other
        individuals, as well as clippings, articles, and mailing lists.
